abilities.name: Deity Penalization
abilities.description: Deity PenalizationAbilityBurst Upon death, Rafaela turns into a beam of Holy Light and launches herself at her killer after a 2s delay, dealing them True Damage equal to 20% of their Max HP. The attack can be blocked by other enemy heroes. This effect won't be triggered if the killer is a non-hero enemy or if they're too far away.
